mapper.update: UPDATE tempregister SET id=#{id}, unit=#{unit}, tmerName=#{tmerName}, minTemp=#{minTemp}, maxTemp=#{maxTemp}, miniScale=#{miniScale}, manufacturer=#{manufacturer}, tmterNo=#{tmterNo}, sampleNo=#{sampleNo}, certificateNo=#{certificateNo}, result=#{result}, createUserID=#{createUserID}, createDate=#{createDate}, tempregisterpointName=#{tempregisterpointName}, immersionType=#{immersionType}, sensingLiquid=#{sensingLiquid}, outMax=#{outMax}, outMin=#{outMin}, id=#{id} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.*,u.realName as createUserName from tempregister t left join user u on t.createUserID = u.id WHERE DATE(createDate) >= DATE(#{startDate}) and DATE(createDate) <= DATE(#{endDate}) order by ${sort} ${dir} order by t.unit asc
select count(1) from tempregister where tmterNo=#{tmterNo} and createDate >= #{startTime} AND createDate <= #{endTime}
